com.cronos.onlinereview.phases.lookup
Class NotificationTypeLookupUtility

java.lang.Object
  com.cronos.onlinereview.phases.lookup.NotificationTypeLookupUtility

public class NotificationTypeLookupUtility
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the function to get lookup id for a lookup name from the "notification_type_lu" table. Since lookup id/value pairs do not change in the database per installation, this classe caches the id/value pairs to minimize queries to the database. This class is used in various methods of PhaseHandler implementations.

Thread safety: This class is thread safe because its static method is synchronized.

Version:
1.0
Author:
tuenm, bose_java

Method Summary
static long lookUpId(java.sql.Connection connection, java.lang.String value)
          Gets the "upload_type_id" for the given value for "name" from "notification_type_lu" table.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

Method Detail

lookUpId

public static long lookUpId(java.sql.Connection connection,
                            java.lang.String value)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
Gets the "upload_type_id" for the given value for "name" from "notification_type_lu" table. This method uses caching mechanism for id/value pairs to minimize queries to the database. Hence if the lookup id is present in the cache, it is returned without hitting the database. It is synchronized to ensure thread safety.

Parameters:
connection - The connection used to access the persistence.
value - The value for "name" column.
Returns:
The corresponding "upload_type_id".
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any input is null or value is empty.
java.sql.SQLException - if there is any problem acessing the database, or if value is not mapped to any record.
